official_title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a special postage stamp in commemoration of the life and work of a man of science, Enrico Fermi.

summary.text: Provides for the issuance of a special postage stamp in commemoration of the life and work of Doctor Enrico Fermi.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a special postage stamp in commemoration of the life and work of a man of science, Enrico Fermi.
